output: html_document
---

```{r echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
punkter <- data.frame(
  lat = c(59.229397, 59.346388),
  lng = c(18.132372, 18.024069),
  lbl = c("Home, sweet home!", "My office is here"))

karta <-
  leaflet(punkter) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(popup = punkter$lbl)

karta
```

Hi! This is a simple map example created with the R Leaflet package.
